name: language-material-translation
description: 智能语言学习助手 - 将英语字幕转化为个性化学习材料的AI助手

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test:e2e: cd test && npm install && npm run install:browsers && npm test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: cd test && npm install && npm run install:browsers && npm run test:headed
scripts.test:e2e:debug: cd test && npm install && npm run install:browsers && npm run test:debug
scripts.test:e2e:ui: cd test && npm install && npm run install:browsers && npm run test:ui

author: PuJes
